tooltip.text: Starts the game and randomly assigns the bone to a player.
Starts the game and allows you to assign the bone to a player.
Removes the current boned user and stops the game.
Randomly transfers the bone to an online player.
Ends the game, boned scores, advancements, and purges storage data. Note: if an offline player has the boned tag, that will not be removed.

Ends the game, boned scores, advancements, and purges storage data but requires an operator to disable/remove the datapack before reload. Note: if an offline player has the boned tag, that will not be removed.
Offers settings to toggle and change in the boned menu
